spell_tooltip.description:
Assault an enemy's mind, dealing 296,126 Shadow damage and briefly reversing their perception of reality.

For 7 sec, the next 1 million damage they deal will heal their target, and the next 1 million healing they deal will damage their target.
Reduces the cooldown of Mass Dispel by 60 sec.

Step into the shadows when you cast Fade, avoiding all attacks and spells for 1 sec.

Interrupt effects are not affected by Phase Shift.
Fill the target with faith in the light, healing for 357,688 over 19 sec.

Summons a shadowy fiend to attack the target for 15 sec.

Generates 0.5% Mana each time the Shadowfiend attacks.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.

A word of dark binding that inflicts 82,567 Shadow damage to your target. If your target is not killed by Shadow Word: Death, you take backlash damage equal to 5% of your maximum health.

Damage increased by 150% to targets below 20% health.
An explosion of holy light around you deals up to 47,969 Holy damage to enemies and up to 32,292 healing to allies within 12 yds, reduced if there are more than 5 targets.
Casting Flash Heal on yourself reduces all damage you take by 10% for 10 sec.

Places a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 50% increased movement speed for 5 sec. When an ally walks through a feather, you are also granted 100% of its effect. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.
If your Shadow Word: Death fails to kill a target at or below 20% health, its cooldown is reset. Cannot occur more than once every 10 sec.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 3%.
Pulls the spirit of a party or raid member, instantly moving them directly in front of you.

Controls a mind up to 1 level above yours for 30 sec while still controlling your own mind. Does not work versus Demonic, Mechanical, or Undead beings or players. This spell shares diminishing returns with other disorienting effects.
For 12 sec after casting Power Word: Shield, you deal 10% additional damage and healing with Smite and Holy Nova.
Dispels magic in a 15 yard radius, removing all harmful Magic from 5 friendly targets and 1 beneficial Magic effect from 5 enemy targets. Potent enough to remove Magic that is normally undispellable.

Infuses the target with power for 15 sec, increasing haste by 20%.

Can only be cast on players.
Increases your Leech by 4%.
Reduces your target's physical damage taken by 5% for 15 sec after a critical heal with Flash Heal or Penance.
Power Infusion also grants you its effect at 100% value when used on an ally. If no ally is targeted, it will grant its effect at 100% value to a nearby ally, preferring damage dealers.

Sanguine Teachings
Sanguine Teachings grants an additional 2% Leech.

 Vampiric Embrace
Reduces the cooldown of Vampiric Embrace by 30 sec, increases its healing done by 25%.
While above 75% health, the cast time of your Flash Heal and Smite are reduced by 10%.
After damaging or healing a target below 35% health, gain 10% increased damage and healing for 8 sec.
20% of Flash Heal healing on other targets also heals you.
Fade reduces damage you take by 10%.
Your healing spells and Smite have a 8% chance to make your next Flash Heal instant and cost no mana. Stacks to 2.
Increases the maximum health gained from Desperate Prayer by 15%.
Power Word: Shield instantly heals the target for 40,969 and reflects 6% of damage absorbed.
Reduces the cooldown of Fade by 10 sec.
Increases the healing of your spells by 3%.
When an attack brings you below 30% health, you gain an absorption shield equal to 15% of your maximum health for 20 sec. Cannot occur more than once every 90 sec.

Attacks from your Shadowfiend siphon life from enemies, healing a nearby injured ally for 180,849.

Attacks from your Mindbender siphon life from enemies, healing a nearby injured ally for 60,283.

Power Word: Shield, Flash Heal, Renew, Power Word: Radiance, and Power Word: Life apply Atonement to your target for 15 sec.

Your spell damage heals all targets affected by Atonement for 32% of the damage done.

Healing increased by 100% when not in a raid.
A burst of light heals the target and 4 injured allies within 40 yards for 552,373, and applies Atonement for 70% of its normal duration.
Reduces all damage taken by a friendly target by 50% for 8 sec. Castable while stunned.
Shadow Word: Pain has a chance to empower your next Penance with Shadow, increasing its effectiveness by 30%.
Power Word: Radiance gains an additional charge.

Pain Suppression gains an additional charge.

Power Word: Shield reduces the cooldown of Pain Suppression by 3 sec.
Mind Blast has a 100% chance to grant Power of the Dark Side and its mana cost is reduced by 40%.
Mind Blast fractures the enemy's mind, increasing your spell damage to the target by 10% for 9 sec.
Reduces the cast time of Power Word: Radiance by 30% and causes it to apply Atonement at an additional 10% of its normal duration.
Summons a holy barrier to protect all allies at the target location for 10 sec, reducing all damage taken by 20% and preventing damage from delaying spellcasting.
Shadow Word: Pain Spreads to 2 nearby enemies when you cast Penance on the target.
Extends Atonement on all allies by 6 sec and heals for 5.8 million, split evenly among them.
Casting Shadowfiend enters you into a shadowy pact, transforming Halo, Divine Star, and Penance into Shadow spells and increasing the damage and healing of your Shadow spells by 35% while active.
Shadow Word: Pain deals 5% additional damage and spreads to 1 additional target when you cast Penance to its target.
Increases the damage of Shadow Word: Pain by 30% and increases its duration by 4 sec.
Shadow Covenant increases Shadow spell damage and healing by an additional 10%.
Casting Power Word: Shield increases your Haste by 8% for 4 sec.

Ascend into the air and unleash a massive barrage of Penance bolts, causing 3 million Holy damage to enemies or 7.8 million healing to allies over 4.8 sec.

While ascended, gain a shield for 100% of your health. In addition, you are unaffected by knockbacks or crowd control effects.
Flash Heal, Power Word: Shield, Penance, Power Word: Radiance, and Power Word: Life have a 20% increased chance to critically heal.
Penance fires one additional bolt of holy light over its duration.
Atonement reduces damage taken by 2%.
Reduces the cooldown of Shadowfiend or Mindbender by 50%.
Direct critical heals create a protective shield on the target, absorbing 30% of the amount healed. Lasts 15 sec.
The damage of Smite and Penance is increased by 8%, and Penance increases or decreases your target's movement speed by 25% for 2 sec.
Power Word: Radiance causes your next Penance to fire 2 additional bolts, stacking up to 2 charges.
Power Word: Shield absorbs 20% additional damage and lasts 5 sec longer.

Your Penance bolts increase the damage of your next Smite by 20%, or the absorb of your next Power Word: Shield by 10%.

Stacks up to 8 times.

Gain access to a spell that gives you an advantage against your fate.  Premonition rotates to the next spell when cast.

 Premonition of Insight
Reduces the cooldown of your next 3 spell casts by 7 sec.

 Premonition of Piety
Increases your healing done by 20% and causes 70% of overhealing on players to be redistributed to up to 4 nearby allies for 15 sec. 

 Premonition of Solace
Your next single target healing spell grants your target a shield that absorbs 2.4 million damage and reduces their damage taken by 15% for 15 sec.

Power Word: Shield absorbs 40% additional damage.

All damage dealt by Penance, Smite and Holy Nova increased by 20%.
Increases the duration of Atonement and Renew by 4 sec.
Premonition causes your next Power Word: Radiance cast to be instant and cost 15% less mana.
Power Word: Shield casts apply 4 stacks of Prayer of Mending to your target.

Your Angelic Feathers increase movement speed by an additional 10%.

When an ally walks through your Angelic Feather, you are also granted 100% of its effect.
Pain Suppression reduces damage taken by an additional 10%.
Your Flash Heal and Power Word: Shield are 30% more effective when cast on yourself.
3 additional Penance bolts are fired at an enemy within 40 yards when healing an ally with Penance, or fired at an ally within 40 yards when damaging an enemy with Penance.
Reduces the cooldown of Premonition by 15 sec.

Casting Premonition of Solace invokes Clairvoyance, expanding your mind and opening up all possibilities of the future.

 Premonition of Clairvoyance
Grants Premonition of Insight, Piety, and Solace at 100% effectiveness.
Fill the target with faith in the light, healing for 357,688 over 19 sec.

Summons a shadowy fiend to attack the target for 15 sec.

Generates 0.5% Mana each time the Shadowfiend attacks.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.

A word of dark binding that inflicts 84,019 Shadow damage to your target. If your target is not killed by Shadow Word: Death, you take backlash damage equal to 5% of your maximum health.

Damage increased by 150% to targets below 20% health.
An explosion of holy light around you deals up to 47,958 Holy damage to enemies and up to 31,670 healing to allies within 12 yds, reduced if there are more than 5 targets.
Casting Flash Heal on yourself reduces all damage you take by 10% for 10 sec.

Places a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 50% increased movement speed for 5 sec. When an ally walks through a feather, you are also granted 100% of its effect. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.
If your Shadow Word: Death fails to kill a target at or below 20% health, its cooldown is reset. Cannot occur more than once every 10 sec.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 3%.

For 12 sec after casting Power Word: Shield, you deal 10% additional damage and healing with Smite and Holy Nova.

Infuses the target with power for 15 sec, increasing haste by 20%.

Can only be cast on players.
Increases your Leech by 4%.
Shadow Word: Death deals 50% less damage to you.
Reduces your target's physical damage taken by 5% for 15 sec after a critical heal with Flash Heal or Penance.
Power Infusion also grants you its effect at 100% value when used on an ally. If no ally is targeted, it will grant its effect at 100% value to a nearby ally, preferring damage dealers.

Sanguine Teachings
Sanguine Teachings grants an additional 2% Leech.

 Vampiric Embrace
Reduces the cooldown of Vampiric Embrace by 30 sec, increases its healing done by 25%.
While above 75% health, the cast time of your Flash Heal and Smite are reduced by 10%.
After damaging or healing a target below 35% health, gain 10% increased damage and healing for 8 sec.
20% of Flash Heal healing on other targets also heals you.
Fade reduces damage you take by 10%.
Your healing spells and Smite have a 8% chance to make your next Flash Heal instant and cost no mana. Stacks to 2.
Increases the maximum health gained from Desperate Prayer by 15%.
Reduces the cooldown of Fade by 10 sec.
Increases the healing of your spells by 3%.
When an attack brings you below 30% health, you gain an absorption shield equal to 15% of your maximum health for 20 sec. Cannot occur more than once every 90 sec.

Attacks from your Shadowfiend siphon life from enemies, healing a nearby injured ally for 180,849.

Attacks from your Mindbender siphon life from enemies, healing a nearby injured ally for 60,283.
Increases the range of most spells by 15%.

Power Word: Shield, Flash Heal, Renew, Power Word: Radiance, and Power Word: Life apply Atonement to your target for 15 sec.

Your spell damage heals all targets affected by Atonement for 32% of the damage done.

Healing increased by 100% when not in a raid.
A burst of light heals the target and 4 injured allies within 40 yards for 536,746, and applies Atonement for 70% of its normal duration.
Reduces all damage taken by a friendly target by 50% for 8 sec. Castable while stunned.
Shadow Word: Pain has a chance to empower your next Penance with Shadow, increasing its effectiveness by 30%.
Power Word: Radiance gains an additional charge.

Pain Suppression gains an additional charge.

Power Word: Shield reduces the cooldown of Pain Suppression by 3 sec.
Mind Blast has a 100% chance to grant Power of the Dark Side and its mana cost is reduced by 40%.
Mind Blast fractures the enemy's mind, increasing your spell damage to the target by 10% for 9 sec.
Reduces the cast time of Power Word: Radiance by 30% and causes it to apply Atonement at an additional 10% of its normal duration.
Summons a holy barrier to protect all allies at the target location for 10 sec, reducing all damage taken by 20% and preventing damage from delaying spellcasting.
Each Penance bolt extends the duration of Shadow Word: Pain on enemies hit by 1.5 sec.
Increases the duration of Schism by 6 sec.
Extends Atonement on all allies by 6 sec and heals for 5.8 million, split evenly among them.
Casting Shadowfiend enters you into a shadowy pact, transforming Halo, Divine Star, and Penance into Shadow spells and increasing the damage and healing of your Shadow spells by 35% while active.
Smite extends the duration of an active Atonement by 3.0 sec.
Atonements granted by Power Word: Shield last an additional 4 sec.
Shadow Covenant increases Shadow spell damage and healing by an additional 10%.

Ascend into the air and unleash a massive barrage of Penance bolts, causing 3 million Holy damage to enemies or 8 million healing to allies over 4.8 sec.

While ascended, gain a shield for 100% of your health. In addition, you are unaffected by knockbacks or crowd control effects.
Atonement heals for 10% more when activated by Shadow spells.
Penance fires one additional bolt of holy light over its duration.
Ultimate Penitence emits an explosion of light, healing up to 10 allies around you for 180,849 and applying Atonement at 50% of normal duration.
Atonement reduces damage taken by 2%.
Reduces the cooldown of Shadowfiend or Mindbender by 50%.
The damage of Smite and Penance is increased by 8%, and Penance increases or decreases your target's movement speed by 25% for 2 sec.
Power Word: Radiance causes your next Penance to fire 2 additional bolts, stacking up to 2 charges.

Penance, Mind Blast and Shadow Word: Death cause your Mindbender or Shadowfiend to teleport behind your target, slashing up to 5 nearby enemies for 115,168 Shadow damage and extending its duration by 0.7 sec.

Your Penance bolts increase the damage of your next Smite by 20%, or the absorb of your next Power Word: Shield by 10%.

Stacks up to 8 times.

Summons a Mindbender to attack the target for 12 sec. 

Generates 0.2% Mana each time the Mindbender attacks.
While Entropic Rift is active, you move 20% faster.

Entropic Rift upgrades Smite into Void Blast while it is active.

Void Blast:
Sends a blast of cosmic void energy at the enemy, causing 138,085 Shadow damage.
Power Word: Shield absorbs 20% additional damage.
Shadow Word: Death consumes absorb shields from your target, dealing 247,986 extra damage to them and granting you 1% mana if a shield was present.
Void Blast increases the duration of Entropic Rift by 1.0 sec, up to a maximum of 3 sec.

Transform your Shadowfiend or Mindbender into a Voidwraith.

Voidwraith
Summon a Voidwraith for 15 sec that casts Void Flay from afar. Void Flay deals bonus damage to high health enemies, up to a maximum of 50% if they are full health.

Generates 0.5% Mana each time the Voidwraith attacks.
While Entropic Rift is active, your Atonement healing is increased by 20%.
Atonement healing with Void Blast is 100% more effective.
You absorb 3% of all magic damage taken. Absorbing Shadow damage heals you for 100% of the amount absorbed.

Each time Penance damages or heals, Entropic Rift is empowered, increasing its damage and size by 10%.

After Entropic Rift ends it collapses, dealing 270,997 Shadow damage split amongst enemy targets within 15 yds.
Fill the target with faith in the light, healing for 357,688 over 19 sec.

Summons a shadowy fiend to attack the target for 15 sec.

Generates 0.5% Mana each time the Shadowfiend attacks.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.

Generates 0.5% Mana each time the Shadowfiend attacks.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.

A word of dark binding that inflicts 82,727 Shadow damage to your target. If your target is not killed by Shadow Word: Death, you take backlash damage equal to 5% of your maximum health.

Damage increased by 150% to targets below 20% health.
An explosion of holy light around you deals up to 47,344 Holy damage to enemies and up to 32,394 healing to allies within 12 yds, reduced if there are more than 5 targets.
Casting Flash Heal on yourself reduces all damage you take by 10% for 10 sec.

Places a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 50% increased movement speed for 5 sec. When an ally walks through a feather, you are also granted 100% of its effect. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.
If your Shadow Word: Death fails to kill a target at or below 20% health, its cooldown is reset. Cannot occur more than once every 10 sec.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 3%.
Pulls the spirit of a party or raid member, instantly moving them directly in front of you.

Controls a mind up to 1 level above yours for 30 sec while still controlling your own mind. Does not work versus Demonic, Mechanical, or Undead beings or players. This spell shares diminishing returns with other disorienting effects.
Dispels magic in a 15 yard radius, removing all harmful Magic from 5 friendly targets and 1 beneficial Magic effect from 5 enemy targets. Potent enough to remove Magic that is normally undispellable.

Infuses the target with power for 15 sec, increasing haste by 20%.

Can only be cast on players.
Fills you with the embrace of Shadow energy for 12 sec, causing you to heal a nearby ally for 50% of any single-target Shadow spell damage you deal.
Shadow Word: Death deals 50% less damage to you.
Power Word: Shield and Leap of Faith increase your target's movement speed by 40% for 3 sec.
Power Infusion also grants you its effect at 100% value when used on an ally. If no ally is targeted, it will grant its effect at 100% value to a nearby ally, preferring damage dealers.

Sanguine Teachings
Sanguine Teachings grants an additional 2% Leech.

 Vampiric Embrace
Reduces the cooldown of Vampiric Embrace by 30 sec, increases its healing done by 25%.
After damaging or healing a target below 35% health, gain 10% increased damage and healing for 8 sec.
Shadow Word: Pain and Purge the Wicked deal an additional 5% damage. When an enemy dies while afflicted by your Shadow Word: Pain or Purge the Wicked, you gain 1.0% Mana.
Creates a ring of Shadow energy around you that quickly expands to a 30 yd radius, healing allies for 158,372 and dealing 141,236 Shadow damage to enemies. Healing reduced beyond 6 targets.
Fade reduces damage you take by 10%.
When your Shadow Word: Pain expires or is refreshed with less than 5 sec remaining, a nearby ally within 40 yards is healed for 238,552.
Increases the maximum health gained from Desperate Prayer by 15%.
Reduces the cooldown of Fade by 10 sec.
You take 2% less damage from enemies affected by your Shadow Word: Pain.
When an attack brings you below 30% health, you gain an absorption shield equal to 15% of your maximum health for 20 sec. Cannot occur more than once every 90 sec.

Attacks from your Shadowfiend siphon life from enemies, healing a nearby injured ally for 180,849.

Attacks from your Mindbender siphon life from enemies, healing a nearby injured ally for 60,283.
Increases the range of most spells by 15%.

Afflicts the target with a disease that instantly causes 203,340 Shadow damage plus an additional 240,935 Shadow damage over 6 sec. Heals you for 30% of damage dealt.

If this effect is reapplied, any remaining damage will be added to the new Devouring Plague.

Disperse into pure shadow energy, reducing all damage taken by 75% for 6 sec and healing you for 25% of your maximum health over its duration, but you are unable to attack or cast spells.

Increases movement speed by 50% and makes you immune to all movement impairing effects.

Castable while stunned, feared, or silenced.

Mind Blast, Devouring Plague, and Void Bolt conjure Shadowy Apparitions that float towards all targets afflicted by your Vampiric Touch for 28,989 Shadow damage. 

Critical strikes increase the damage by 100%.
Silences the target, preventing them from casting spells for 4 sec. Against non-players, also interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 4 sec.
Healing from Vampiric Touch and Devouring Plague when you are at maximum health will shield you for the same amount. The shield cannot exceed 10% of your maximum health.
Vampiric Touch also applies Shadow Word: Pain to the target. Shadow Word: Pain lasts an additional 5 sec.
Mind Blast gains an additional charge.

Your direct damage spells inflict 30% of their damage on all other targets afflicted by your Vampiric Touch within 40 yards.

Does not apply to damage from Shadowy Apparitions, Shadow Word: Pain, and Vampiric Touch.

Every 2 casts of Devouring Plague transforms your next Mind Flay or Mind Spike into a more powerful spell. Can accumulate up to 4 charges.

 Mind Flay: Insanity
Assaults the target's mind with Shadow energy, causing 486,403 Shadow damage over 1.2 sec and slowing their movement speed by 70%.

Generates 12 Insanity over the duration.

Mind Spike: Insanity
Blasts the target for 339,458 Shadowfrost damage.

Generates 12 Insanity.

Aim a bolt of slow-moving Shadow energy at the destination, dealing 67,904 Shadow damage to all enemies within 8 yds.

Generates 6 Insanity.

This spell is cast at a selected location.

Increases your non-periodic Shadow damage by 20% for 20 sec.

Generates 30 Insanity.

Increases the damage of Mind Flay and Mind Spike by 10%.

The duration of your Shadow Word: Pain and Vampiric Touch is increased by 1 sec when enemies suffer damage from Mind Flay and 2 sec when enemies suffer damage from Mind Spike.
Shadow Crash applies Vampiric Touch to up to 8 targets it damages.
Shadow Word: Pain periodic damage has a chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Mind Blast and cause your next Mind Blast to be instant.
Voidform and Dark Ascension increase the critical strike chance of your spells by 10% for 20 sec, reducing by 0.5% every sec.
Increases your Devouring Plague damage by 6% and increases your maximum Insanity by 50.
Vampiric Touch deals 15% additional damage and has a chance to generate 1 Insanity each time it deals damage.
Your Mind Flay, Mind Spike, and Void Torrent damage increase the damage of your periodic Shadow effects by 2%, stacking up to 5 times.
Reduces the Insanity cost of Devouring Plague by 5.
Your Shadow Word: Pain damage has a chance to reset the cooldown of Shadow Word: Death, increase its damage by 25%, and deal damage as if striking a target below 20% health.

Channel a torrent of void energy into the target, dealing 1 million Shadow damage over 3 sec.

Generates 24 Insanity over the duration.
Increases the critical strike chance of Mind Blast, Mind Spike, Mind Flay, and Shadow Word: Death by 8% and increases their critical strike damage by 40%.
Devouring Plague causes your Shadow Word: Pain and Vampiric Touch to deal damage 40% faster on all targets for 3 sec.
While you have Shadow Word: Pain, Devouring Plague, and Vampiric Touch active on the same target, your Mind Blast and Void Torrent deal 40% more damage.
Reduces the cooldown of Void Torrent by 15 sec.

Your periodic Shadow Word: Pain and Vampiric Touch damage has a 30% chance to apply Echoing Void, max 4 targets.

Each time Echoing Void is applied, it has a chance to collapse, consuming a stack every 1 sec to deal 11,665 Shadow damage to all nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

If an enemy dies with Echoing Void, all stacks collapse immediately.

Mind Flay, Mind Spike, and Void Torrent have a chance to spawn a Void Tendril that channels Mind Flay or Void Lasher that channels Mind Sear at your target.

 Mind Flay
Assaults the target's mind with Shadow energy, causing 311,661 Shadow damage over 15 sec and slowing their movement speed by 30%.

Generates 10 Insanity over the duration.

Mind Sear
Corrosive shadow energy radiates from the target, dealing 165,426 Shadow damage over 15 sec to all enemies within 10 yards of the target. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Generates 10 Insanity over the duration.
While Entropic Rift is active, you move 20% faster.

Entropic Rift upgrades Smite into Void Blast while it is active.

Void Blast:
Sends a blast of cosmic void energy at the enemy, causing 141,211 Shadow damage.
Power Word: Shield absorbs 20% additional damage.
Shadow Word: Death consumes absorb shields from your target, dealing 248,645 extra damage to them and granting you 1% mana if a shield was present.
Void Blast increases the duration of Entropic Rift by 1.0 sec, up to a maximum of 3 sec.
Shadow Word: Death has a high chance to summon a Shadowfiend for 5 sec when damaging targets below 20% health.
While Entropic Rift is active, your Atonement healing is increased by 20%.
Atonement healing with Void Blast is 100% more effective.
Every 3 sec siphon an amount equal to 4% of your health from an ally within 40 yds if they are higher health than you.

Each time Penance damages or heals, Entropic Rift is empowered, increasing its damage and size by 10%.

After Entropic Rift ends it collapses, dealing 270,997 Shadow damage split amongst enemy targets within 15 yds.
